item.title: How to Grow Eggplant from Cutting
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Learn how to grow Eggplant from cuttings. This is a detailed step-by-step video with 3 months worth of plant growth updates. ▼Scan @ Video Index▼ 00:00 Intro 01:23 Eggplant Information...

The post How to Grow Eggplant from Cutting appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Learn how to grow Eggplant from cuttings. This is a detailed step-by-step video with 3 months worth of plant growth updates.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro

  • 6:58 Cutting Update after 13 Days
  • 7:16 Cutting Update after 17 Days
  • 7:41 Eggplant Transplant
  • 8:37 Eggplant Growth after 2 Month
  • 9:15 Eggplant Growth after 3 Month

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on How to Grow Eggplant from Cutting. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it.
